author: zhaobenny
description: Human-like Discord interactions powered by OpenAI for messages (and images)
install_msg:
See cog README for additional setup. 
 Quick startup guide: 
 1. Set (preferably paid account) OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY 
 2. [p]aiuser add <#CHANNEL_NAME> 
 3. [p]aiuser optin to opt yourself into getting messages used (other users will need to do the same)
short: Human-like user behavior powered by OpenAI.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users, but chat messages may be sent to OpenAI to generate responses. Please refer to: <https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy>. Images (if enabled) may be sent to ai-horde. Please refer to: <https://stablehorde.net/privacy>
